title: Gamification-Based Advanced Computer Programming Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Programming Fundamentals and Basic Data Structure Concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening formative assessment through gamification in smartphone-centered limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts of data structures with over 85% accuracy through online practice activities utilizing gamification elements.
Learners improve their ability to solve complex algorithm problems by 30% through gamification mechanisms such as leaderboards and badges.
Learners increase their self-directed learning engagement by 50% through points earned during formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
